entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle changing to rain or periods of drizzle near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
